Literature.Title: Systematic approach to optimizing specifically targeted antimicrobial peptides against Streptococcus mutans
Literature.Author: He J, Yarbrough DK, Kreth J, Anderson MH, Shi W, Eckert R

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Streptococcus mutans UA159(MIC=>500µg/ml),Streptococcus sobrinus ATCC 33478(MIC=>500µg/ml),Streptococcus sanguinis NY101(MIC=>500µg/ml),Streptococcus mitis ATCC 903(MIC=>500µg/ml),Streptococcus gordonii Challis DL1(MIC=>500µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=>500µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis(MIC=>500µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAK(MIC=>500µg/ml),Escherichia coli W3110(MIC=>500µg/ml)
